name: Project Bombs
description:
Have you ever wanted to be one of the cool dudes that don´t look at explosions? Then this game is perfect for you! It has slow-motion explosions stuff flying everywhere and .... well thats it. 

This is my first weekend Project (will be a series of smaller games, developed in 2 days, released every now and then). The game contains about 30 minutes play time (5 levels), so it´s free. If you want to motivate me for bigger projects or more small ones, you can donate. I´ll be happy about every penny.

Works fine with: Intel I7/7Gen,  NVidia GTX 1060, 12GB RAM
